channel.title: Reset nulls?
channel.description:
Hey can someone give me the command so that when the line = null on my server it resets because about every 4 hours my server gets this and says Code: [code] null null null[/code]
And lags the server Note:Im using deltascape source and i have to reset my server just to stop it and i was thinking if there is a code that if line = null then reset?
Please give me the code and where to place it thanks
Much appriciated
